prompt: Truck driver practices smooth eco-driving along a tree-lined European road
Close-up of a truck being refuelled with biodiesel at a rural service station
Dispatchers monitor a European map that highlights optimised truck routes and emission savings indicators
Digital map displays trucks being rerouted by AI based on live traffic, weather and emissions data
Split scene showing a paper-heavy traditional forwarding office beside a streamlined digital control room
Dashboard view of a digital forwarding platform with instant quotes, live tracking and carbon metrics
Illustration of an EU map showing a truck crossing borders with arrows indicating cabotage routes, with a calendar icon illustrating the four-day cooling-off period.
Photo of a European lorry returning to its home base depot at sunset, warehouse in the background.
Illustration of a European city map with highlighted low-emission zones, toll gateways and different coloured truck icons indicating Euro VI and electric vehicles.
Photo of a heavy-duty electric truck passing a toll station on a European motorway with wind turbines in the background.
Photo of a refrigerated truck loading pallets of perishable goods at a European cross-docking facility, with temperature sensors visible.
illustration showing a cold chain logistics flow in Europe, including icons for ATP certificates, HACCP procedures, temperature monitoring, and low-GWP refrigerants.
Photo of trucks queuing at the UK-EU border control post with customs officers inspecting documentation, cloudy weather.
Illustration of a supply chain diagram showing customs declarations, rules of origin certificates, and SPS checks between the EU and UK.
Illustration of a tablet displaying a consignment note (e-CMR) with checkmarks and a truck icon, EU stars in the background.
Photo of a truck driver using a handheld device to show electronic freight documents at a border checkpoint in Europe.
Illustration of a multimodal logistics network in Europe showing containers moving between trucks, trains, barges and short-sea ships with arrows.
Photo of a European intermodal terminal with a freight train loading containers from road trucks and cranes in the background.
Photo of a row of parked semi-trailer trucks with a hiring sign in a European truck yard, cloudy sky.
illustration depicting demographic distribution in road freight: ageing drivers, young entrants, licence costs and gender gap.
Truck clears an EU border checkpoint while customs officers verify paperwork
Driver hands a CMR consignment note to customs staff at a European border gate
Infographic summarising the essential paperwork for cross-border European road freight
illustration showing a circular supply chain loop with forward and reverse logistics arrows, containers being reused and recycling icons, set in a European context.
Photo of a warehouse sorting returned parcels for refurbishment and recycling, with workers handling items and green signage.
Illustration of a European city with micro-hubs, cargo bikes and electric vans delivering parcels through low-emission zones, icons showing dynamic routing.
Photo of a courier using an electric cargo bike in a European pedestrian zone, historic buildings in the background.
Photo of an automated warehouse in Europe with autonomous mobile robots moving pallets along narrow aisles under bright lighting.
illustration showing different automation technologies in a warehouse: AS/RS systems, conveyor belts, robotic palletizers and pick-and-place arms.
Logistics manager reviews a screen that breaks down Incoterms responsibilities for buyers and sellers
Chart comparing EXW and FCA responsibilities for a sample European shipment
Side-by-side view comparing a dedicated FTL truck with a groupage trailer carrying multiple pallets
Warehouse team wraps and straps pallets before loading them for a groupage shipment
Map of Europe showing key road corridors with typical transit times, clocks and rest-stop markers
Truck navigates a snowy mountain pass, illustrating how weather and terrain stretch transit time
Diagram explaining how the base fuel price, index values and surcharge percentages combine on a freight invoice
Truck approaches a European toll gate where digital signs show toll rates and CO2 charges
Calendar highlighting major European logistics peaks such as Chinese New Year, summer holidays and holiday sales
Busy European warehouse packed with pallets and staff preparing shipments during peak season
Cutaway diagram of a Euro pallet showing recommended stacking patterns and weight distribution
Warehouse workers wrap and strap a pallet to secure mixed cargo before transport
Freight forwarder's control tower with live dashboards, maps and paperwork being processed
Logistics manager and freight forwarder review shipment paperwork together in an office
Checklist graphic reminding drivers to inspect equipment, load correctly and seal the trailer to prevent cargo damage
